title: CIM
content: Founded in 1985, the Chern Institute of Mathematics (CIM) was led by Professor Shiing-Shen Chern, the first director of the Institute until 1992 appointed by the Ministry of Education of China. The Theoretical Physics Division of the Institute was founded in 1986 by the Nobel Prize laureate Chen-Ning Yang. CIM is an open research institute.
